mapper.select: select g.id from organization g where lower(g.name) = #{orgName} and g.status != 1
select g.id, g.name, g.address, g.description from organization g where g.id = #{orgId}
mapper.insert: insert into organization (name, address, description, code, level, createTime) value (#{orgName}, #{address}, #{description}, #{code}, #{level}, now())
mapper.update: update organization set name = #{orgName}, address = #{address}, description = #{description}, updateTime = now() where id = ${orgId}
update organization set status = 1 where id = #{orgId}
